euclidean.answer: Metformin is an insulin sensitizer.  Generally, it is very well tolerated.Some people do have upset tummy when they start, but if you do you can start the drug slowly, and most people get used to it in a short time.
I'm on metformin and have experienced no weight loss that I can attribute to the drug alone, nor have I suffered from any side effects.
